prompt.prompt: Find the mean of the dataset: 5, 6, 8, 8, 10, 15, 18
Find the median of the dataset: 11, 18, 19, 23, 13
Find the mode(s) of the dataset: 7, 9, 9, 9, 11, 11,13

Here is a list of the number of words per minute that 6 students can type: 42, 44, 46, 46, 47, 80  

 Which measure of center best describes the number of words per minute each student can type?

The survey results are in! Favorite pizza toppings among the 8 surveyed students are as follows: pepperoni, pepperoni, cheese, pepperoni, sausage, olives, broccoli, pepperoni. 

 Which measure of center best describes students' favorite topping?

Jenny collected some data and plotted it in the histogram below. She wants to summarize the data using a measure of center. 

 Which measure of center will best summarize her data? 

 ![](./Eh.png)
When the points in a dataset are fairly balanced on either side of the middle, statisticians usually use ___ to summarize the data.
